mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Barclay, Ted, 1844-1915
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Describes a "bust-up" caused by Lovings (with Secretary of War Benjamin) countermanding Jackson's orders. Also mentions that he needs a coat and how good it is to be stationed at Headquarters.
There are three files available: a PDF transcription, a plain text transcription, and a PDF which was created from scans of the original document.
